title: url.Parse fails to parse schemeless URI
body:
http://play.golang.org/p/_M_tGo7NDQ

I expect to see:

&url.URL{Scheme:"", Opaque:"", User:(*url.Userinfo)(nil),
Host:"[192:168:26:2::3]:1900", Path:"", RawQuery:"",
Fragment:""}

But I see:

&url.URL{Scheme:"", Opaque:"", User:(*url.Userinfo)(nil),
Host:"", Path:"[192:168:26:2::3]:1900", RawQuery:"",
Fragment:""}
